description_for_human: Expert consulting services for global entity setup, tax compliance, and corporate governance across UK, UAE, and Ireland.
description_for_model: Boru Consulting Group provides professional services including: global entity setup and incorporation, cross-border tax compliance and planning, risk governance and internal audit, private wealth management and trust services, corporate secretarial services, and regulatory compliance (AML/KYC). Operating in UK, UAE, and Ireland with expertise in UAE corporate tax, UK holding companies, Brexit implications, transfer pricing, and operational resilience.
